text:
aqgnayE&nI#kavatEq rOhi#tA~jjiranaqDvAnaqdhOrA#mau sAviqtrau pauqShNau ra#jaqtanA#BI vaiSvadEqvau piqSa~ggau# tUpaqrau mA#ruqtaH kaqlmASha# AgnEqyaH kRuqShNO#&jaH sA#rasvaqtI mEqShI vA#ruqNaH kRuqShNa Eka#SitipAqt pEtva#H || 62
(aqgnayEq - dvAvi(gm)#SatiH) (A24)

Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 24 Anuvaakams :- 
(yadEkE#na - praqjApa#tiH prEqNA&nuq - yajuqShA - &&pO# - viqSvakaqrmA - &gnaq A yA#hi - suvaqrgAyaq vajrO# - gAyaqtrENA - gna# udadhE - saqmIcI - ndrA#ya - maqyu - raqpAM - balA#ya - puruShamRuqgaH - sauqrI - pRu#ShaqtaH - SakAq - ruru# - ralaqjaH - su#paqrNa - A$gnEqyO - &SvOq - &gnayE&nI#kavatEq - catu#rvi(gm)SatiH)
	
Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Panchaatis :-
(yadEkE#naq - sa pApI#yA - nEqtadvA aqgnE - rdhanuqstad - dEqvAstvEndra#jyEShThA - aqpAM naptrE - &Sva#stUpaqrO - dviSha#ShTiH)

First and Last Padam of Fifth Prasnam of 5th Kandam
(yadEkEq - naika#SitipAqt pEtva#H) 

|| hari#H OM ||

|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakANDE pa~jcamaH praSnaH samAptaH ||
------------------------------------

OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH, SrI guruByO namaH
haqriqH OM

5.6	 pa~jcamakANDE ShaShThaH praSnaH - upAnuvAkyABidhAnaM
